cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 250 miles SE of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the middle Texas coast where it is forecast to stall for several days
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just northeast of Corpus Christi, TX (between Port Mansfield and Sargent)

weather_observation.watch_coast: South of Port Mansfield TX to the Mouth of the Rio Grande (Storm Surge Watch) and south of Port Mansfield TX to the Mouth of the Rio Grande (Hurricane Watch); south of the Mouth of the Rio Grande to Boca de Catan MX (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Port Mansfield to High Island TX (Storm Surge Warning); Port Mansfield to Sargent TX (Hurricane Warning); north of Sargent to High Island TX and south of Port Mansfield to Mouth of Rio Grande (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle and upper Texas coast, southwestern Louisiana coast
